welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Parsippany-Troy Hills, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, lively downtown area, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the city has to offer. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for Delta and Delta Connection airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and United Express.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, Alaska Airlines, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
